title: Bullish Two Hundred Day Moving Average Cross - BG - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Bunge Ltd. (Symbol: BG) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $54.34, changing hands as high as $55.73 per share. Bunge Ltd. shares are currently trading up about 2.9% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of BG shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, BG's low point in its 52 week range is $47.26 per share, with $72.35 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $55.46.
